places_with_reviews.name: Manav Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: Ankleshwar GIDC, Piraman, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393001, India

reviews.text: Very peaceful, located at the heart of city.
Very beautiful and peacefull place.

Have grown up watching this temple evolve to what we see today. A lovely place of worship.

Regular celebrations are held on various festivals. Janmashtami, shivratri etc are celebrated with gusto.

Manav mandir is one of the oldest places to organise Navratri Garba and In the most traditional way without any unnecessary modernizations.

MANAV MANDIR, LOCATED IN GIDC NEW COLONY AREA OF ANKLESHWAR....This Unique Name Is DERIVED FROM Another Temple of MEMNAGAR, AHMEDABAD....

IT'S MANAGED BY GIDC SANSKRITIK YUVAK MANDAL... THEY ARE ORGANIZING ALL MAJOR  HINDU FESTIVALS INTO THEIR PREMISES, REGULARLY...

A MID SIZED SATSANG HALL  IS ALSO AVAILABLE IN THE TEMPLE CAMPUS FOR VARIOUS COMMUNITY RELATED ACTIVITIES...

JAI BHOLENATH...
Good atmosphere of worshipping of Lord Shiva at this temple here having good vibes

reviews.text: A very good park for activities such as playing sports, doing exercises, spending leisure time amidst greenery etc...👍👍
Good place!! Green ground & calm atmosphere. Excercise tools available
The well-maintained paths provide a pleasant environment for jogging or walking .Joggers Park is a refreshing haven in the GIDC residencial area.

Fun place to spend quality time with family and friends, has enough area to jog, run, exercise, hangout and chill.

It has got nice greenary all around, has a fountain, and public restrooms are also available.

Nice Place for visit, chilling, morning and evening walk. Best place for kids to play. Clean and neat place. So many different trees available in heres. Seating places also good. Gardening work is also good.

places_with_reviews.name: Ramkund Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: RAMKUND, Off, Hansot Rd, Vrundavan Township, Boidara, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393001, India

reviews.text: Temple & ashram with facilities for large numbers (200 - 300 people at a time) of pilgrims.  Kund (pond) water looks green in color.  It's crowded, noisy and litter everywhere.  Vehicles also crowd around.  The ashram people are doing their best to deal with lots of pilgrims visiting.

This place is very sacred place. In Ramayan time Prabhu Shri Ram, Sita and Laxman pass through this place. There is an ancient reservoir Kund here. which is called Ram Kund. There are many temples inside this place. Here the saints who do the Narmada Parikrama mostly come here to stay. There is a good arrangement for food etc. for the devotees, Also this place contains śmaśāna (श्मशान) is a Hindu crematory ground, where dead bodies are brought to be burnt on a pyre.
Historical place at ANKLESHWAR .Providing stay and food to people travelling bank of river Narmada giving homage.
Very Spiritual Place. Rama Kund.

One of the historical place.
Gau shala.
Ram kund.

places_with_reviews.name: Pashupatinath Temple પશુપતિનાથ મંદિર
places_with_reviews.address: J239+C6V, Ankleshwar GIDC, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393001, India

reviews.text:
This temple is conveniently situated in the Ankleshwar GIDC area, making it easily accessible for both locals and visitors.
Ankleshwar GIDC Pashupatinath Temple is a hidden gem in the industrial landscape of Ankleshwar. Its spiritual ambiance and architectural beauty make it a must-visit destination for those seeking a spiritual retreat in the midst of urban life.

Very peaceful and beautiful Temple🌿🍃
Jay Pashupatinath🙏
Temple of lord Shiva , Hanuman, Sita Ram and Radhe Krishna. A peaceful place where people reach to pray.
Nice temple. Cleaning is quite good. Old age people can spend all the day out here. Silence make great effect and gives u change to think over ur self.

Beautiful and peaceful temple where you can get darshan of Lord Ganesha, Shiv ji, Ram Lakshman And sita ji, Hanuman ji and Shani Maharaj. If got a chance then definitely come here and take blessings from supreme God..
Har har Mahadev.. Jai Shankar maharaj 🙏

places_with_reviews.name: Halimshah Datar Bhandari R.A.
places_with_reviews.address: mullawad, near regal hall, Joshiya Faliya, Taibah Nagar, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393001, India

reviews.text: Very famous Dargah in Ankaleshwar ..hardly 1 kms from Rlwy. Stn. Very well maintained masjid & garden style Qabrastan in the Dargah complex...only few eateries nearby..

Very known Sufi saint belonging to the khawaja garib nawaz, name is abdul halim shah datar bhandari, he is treasurer of khawaja garib nawaz, pilgrims come from across nearby cities and villages, very peaceful place and also well maintained.
Nice place for spiritual peace blessing from Almighty Allah. Must visit
This is the place where everyone's heart finds peace
The most holy place of Muslim community after Ajmer Dargah Sharif.even non-muslims are also keeps their trust on this , called HALIMSHADADA.
